edu.cscc.javaadventure.engine

Interface GameEngine


  • public interface GameEngine
    GameEngine.tick is a function which gets a command from the user and executes the command to generate a new GameState. It passes a function, CommandPrinter, to the Command object to be executed if the command fails.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GameState tick(GameState gameState, GetUserCommand getUserCommand, CommandPrinter commandPrinter)
      Advance the game forward by creating a new GameState.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        static GameState tick(GameState gameState,
                      GetUserCommand getUserCommand,
                      CommandPrinter commandPrinter)
        Advance the game forward by creating a new GameState.
        Parameters:
        gameState - The current GameState.
        getUserCommand - A functional interface, to retrieve the user input.
        commandPrinter - A functional interface, CommandPrinter, to handle command failure.
        Returns:
        The new GameState.
